ab.seg: Crack making on the jiazi day [1],
Crack making on the jiazi day [1],
(In) performing the lustration/exorcism ritual (with) a rong-sacrificial meat [肜], we will hold a religious service/rite.
Crack making on the jiazi day [1],
(If we) issue a call to attempt capturing [[罒+兔]], (they) will (be able to) arrest (captives [to be] >) escapees.
(If they) attempt capturing [[罒+兔]], (captives [to be] >) escapees will be arrested.
Crack making on the bingyin day [3],
(When) issuing a call [to arrest] the (captives [to be] >) escapees, (we) should take archers (射子=射手, David Pankenier’s suggestion dated November 27, 2009, but see [9] below).
Crack making on the jisi day [6],
(We) should perform the religious service (with) a (male pig:) boar (at) Zhu.
Crack making on the jisi day [6],
(In) the present month there shall be no misfortunes.
Crack making on the jisi day [6],
(We) should shoot Zi who snatched. (Construction and meaning unclear.)
Crack making on the gengwu day [7],
(If we) issue a call to attempt capturing [ [罒+兔]], (they) will (be able to) make an arrest (of POW’s).
Crack making on the gengwu day [7],
(If we) issue a call to attempt capturing [ [罒+兔]], (they) will (be able to) make an arrest (of POW’s).
Crack making on the gengwu day [7],
(We will) (receive:) reap [a good harvest of] this autumn (and) make it available (to the Shang). (Construction and meaning unclear.)
Yu made cracks (= divined) and tested:
(As for) the present autumn [harvest], we should contribute (it to) the Shang (royal house).
Zi made cracks (= divined) and tested:
(If we) perform the religious service (with) humans,
Zi made cracks (= divined) and tested:
It should be (to) the sun (that we) perform a religious service (with) slices of dried meat [膱].
Yu made cracks (= divined) and tested:
(As for) the present autumn [harvest at] Cu, (we) should make it available [to the Shang].
(As for) the present autumn [harvest at] Cu,
(we) should make it available [to the Shang royal house].
Yu made cracks (= divined) and tested:
(As for) the present autumn [harvest at] Cu, (we) should make it available [to the Shang].
In the ninth month (we) will hold a religious service/rite.
In the ninth month (we) will hold a religious service/rite.
Zi made cracks (= divined) and tested:
(If we) perform a religious service (with) humans,
(In) the present eighth month (we) will hold a religious service/rite.
(We) should make an offering of delicacies (/脂 fat?).
(We) should make an offering of delicacies (/脂 fat?).
Crack making on the bingshen day [33]:
It will be the present eighth month
It will be on the geng day (i.e., gengzi [37]?)
(that we make an offering of) delicacies (/脂 fat?).
It will be on the xin day (i.e., xinchou [38]?)
(that we) make an offering of delicacies (/脂 fat?).
Yisi day [42]. (Chang lists this date out of sequence — it should come last.)
(we should make an offering of) a (male pig:) boar.
Crack making on the dingyou day [34],
(We) should conduct a lustration/exorcism ritual (to) Xiong Ding.
(We) should make a (food) offering of [*?]5 our delicacies.
It should be large specially reared sheep
[that we offer] on the dingsi day [54].
Crack making on the wuxu day [35],
Crack making on the jihai day [36],
it is (for) the religious service/rite that (he) (uses:) takes advantage of (?).
Crack making on the jihai day [36],
(Di) will approve of (his) taking advantage (of the service/rite) (?).
Crack making on the jihai day [36],
signifies the approval [by Di] (in his) (use:) pretex (of the service/rite) (?).
…, it is his pretex (of the service/rite) (?).
(Di) will not be approving (his) pretex (of the service/rite) (?).
Crack making on the jihai day [36],
Crack making on the jihai day [36],
(We) should direct the lustration ritual (to) Xiao Ji,
(for) it will meet with approval [by Di].
Crack making on the jihai day [36],
(We) should direct the lustration ritual (to) Bi Ji.
Crack making on the gengzi day [37],
(As for) Yu [[亻+ 魚]]’s coming, it is (for) the x10 service/rite that (he) makes use of (?).
